attributes.action: appoint Gen Sir Richard Dannatt as Chief of the Defence Staff or have the moral courage to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Passing over the present Chief of the General Staff because he did the right thing in speaking up for the people for whom he is responsible is a wonderful demonstration of the lack of moral fibre now evident in political circles.

Either the Prime Minister should show some courage and appoint Sir Richard to the post of Chief of the Defence Staff as would have happened or he should fall on his own sword.

rejection.details: Sir Richard Dannatt is currently the Chief of General Staff, the professional head of the British Army
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
